title: Quartermaster

fields.name: Supplies Surprise (x2, Charge 120%):
fields.value: Target a player during the Evening, before results. At the end of the Evening, they will be granted an additional 40% that they can apply to one of their abilities that uses a Charge.

fields.name: Denied Supplies (x1, Charge 120%):
fields.value: Target a player during the Evening, before results. If they have an ability that requires a Charge, you will reduce that Charge to 0% before their score is added. If they have multiple, one is selected at random. You can't use this simultaneously with Supplies Surprise.
